# vago v1.0.1 (26-Mar-2017)

- #9 handle abandoned and overrun cases
- #8 Make Close() goroutine safe

## Changes

- #10 add support to handle cursor options
- #7 add support for configuration parameters
- improve error handling
- test against go1.8
